instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..
definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Where to get Replacement components or Donor Board
threads.message:
Hi All,

a customer decided to open up his Macbook and try and fix the trackpad and in the process ripped off some components as below

[LIST]
[*]<CAPACITOR>C5850</CAPACITOR>
[*]<CHIP>U5850</CHIP> 
[*]<CHIP>U4402</CHIP>
[*]<CHIP>U4408</CHIP>
[*]<CAPACITOR>C4050</CAPACITOR>
[/LIST]

Board view & Schematic attached, I now need to locate either the individual components or a donor board (Aliexpress not good here)
I need to be able to find good identifying information from schematic and boardview in order to track down individual parts on Aliexpress etc but this is no easy thus I would prefer to find donor board for this or similar model, any help to put me in the right direction would be appreciated.

The components the customer knocked off the board are causing the Macbook to run slow and the FAN to run high all the time.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Where to get Replacement components or Donor Board
threads.message:
No idea why Aliexpress is not good there.
Is the most used site to get scrap boards and parts.

You can look on Aliexpress, as eBay too, and contact sellers directly.
You can get better price and faster shipping options are available.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Where to get Replacement components or Donor Board
threads.message: [SIZE=7][B]When i look for board <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A orA1706 on Alibaba or Aliexpress or Ebay I get no donor boards, only high price tested boards.[/B][/SIZE]

threads.title: Macbook Pro <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Where to get Replacement components or Donor Board
threads.message:
Try more; using bold and higer letters, do not help...
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.aliexpress.com/item/4000113175850.html?spm=a2g0o.productlist.0.0.66f32f41UFykRH&algo_pvid=0a3bb65b-d4c5-4e95-8421-4618bdee15e8&algo_expid=0a3bb65b-d4c5-4e95-8421-4618bdee15e8-2&btsid=0b0a050b16073400993442603ef770&ws_ab_test=searchweb0_0,searchweb201602_,searchweb201603_[/URL]

You can write to other sellers, who have different <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>/7/8 boards for sale.
They usually can get more models than listed on the site.
